full_text: Also. We should DH alec bohm. Dunno how but we have to make that happen

We can’t do anything right and our execution is fucking atrocious to watch. We win this game if we aren’t swinging at terrible pitches and our defense had half a brain (Matt vierling) this is so frustrating after all the hype
